Name: Lima Sour
Ingredients: 60 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Serve with straws.
Review: A refreshing blend of pisco, maraschino and citrus.
Nutrition: One serving of Lima Sour contains 216 calories
